snippet.title: Railroader Developer Q&A - August 2022
snippet.description:
Adam and Matt answer questions submitted by the RAILROADER Discord community.

0:00 Intro
0:30 Basics
6:38 Equipment: Locomotives & Rolling Stock
12:53 Gameplay
21:56 Map & Ops
24:50 Simulation
28:32 Derailments, Damage & Wear
31:07 Weather
34:17 Release
37:26 Wrap-up

Railroader is a cooperative multiplayer and singleplayer railroad simulator set on a short line in transition era Appalachia – sometime in the 1940's to 1950's. It's about running freight and passenger trains – switching cars, pick-ups, set-outs, and switch lists.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1683150/Railroader/

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/KpVkaDM7Nb
